prompt:
I run an offline bakery shop and want to take it online so more people can discover and order from me. using Web Development.
Current step: Choose Web Development.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: Frontend, Backend, Deployment & Hosting.

I run an offline bakery shop and want to take it online so more people can discover and order from me. using Web Development + Frontend.
Current step: Choose Frontend.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: Client-Side Rendering (CSR), Server-Side Rendering (SSR), Progressive Web App (PWA), Static Site Generation (SSG), WebAssembly (Wasm), Incremental Static Regeneration (ISR), Cross Platform Frontend Languages, Transpiled-to-JavaScript Languages.

I run an offline bakery shop and want to take it online so more people can discover and order from me. using Web Development + Backend.
Current step: Choose Backend.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: REST, GraphQL, gRPC, WebSockets, Server-Sent Events (SSE), WebRTC.

I run an offline bakery shop and want to take it online so more people can discover and order from me. using Web Development + Frontend + Static Site Generation (SSG).
Current step: Choose Static Site Generation (SSG).
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, Go.

I run an offline bakery shop and want to take it online so more people can discover and order from me. using Web Development + Backend + REST.
Current step: Choose REST.
From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.
Options: JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, Java, PHP, Go, C#, Ruby, Rust, Elixir, Kotlin, Scala, Dart, Haskell, Crystal, Lua, R, C/C++.

I run an offline bakery shop and want to take it online so more people can discover and order from me. using Web Development + Backend + GraphQL.

From the following options,you *must* recommend only one if there is a clearly best choice for the current task. If there isn’t a single best option, *then only* give me more options.

I run an offline bakery shop and want to take it online so more people can discover and order from me. using Web Development + Frontend + Static Site Generation (SSG) + JavaScript/TypeScript.

I run an offline bakery shop and want to take it online so more people can discover and order from me. using Web Development + Backend + GraphQL + JavaScript/TypeScript.
